title: The stories.
content: Memorable stories from HackBeanpot are just one of the things that make us unique. Our attendees range from CS graduate students to beginner designers who have never written a line of code before.

title: The projects.
content: Projects at HackBeanpot are about learning and exploration. In past years they’ve ranged from a crowdsourced music playlist to a scripting language made entirely of emojis.

title: The people.
content:
Every year HackBeanpot looks forward to hosting 150+ curious students, experienced hackers, and hi-tech sponsors in Boston. The only person we’re missing is you!
